CustomField.formula: "All ethic approvals required for the research covered in this proposal must be associated to this proposal." & br() & "Use the fields below to indicate if additional ethics approvals are required and list their types and the date they will be required." & br() & "To link an existing ethics approval or application:" & br() & "- Navigate to the ethics approval/application record" & br() & "- Select the ‘Link Project/Proposal’" & br() & "- Search for this proposal using the proposal’s title" & br() & "- Select save"
CustomField.label: Please Note
